description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
number of new full-time equivalent jobs created for women 15+ years old
number of new full-time equivalent jobs created for men 15+ years old
total number of new full-time equivalent jobs created
number of additional females benefitting from UNDP's livelihoods interventions
number of additional males benefitting from UNDP's livelihoods interventions
number of additional people benefitting from UNDP's livelihoods interventions
To enhance the capacities of MICAD , programs and foreign aid in all forms of development programs and evaluating the impact of these programs.

policy, planning and administration

UNDP supports DCCE in the publication of annual reports on energy, environment, sustainability and green economy. These in turn help asses Dubai's progress towards consolidating its position as a global hub for sustainability and green economy.

Publication of annual reports on energy, environment, sustainability and green economy. These in turn help asses Dubai's progress towards consolidating its position as a global hub for sustainability and green economy.
first-order administrative division
State of Energy Report and Dubai Green Economy Report Produced

comment.narrative: No Existing State of Energy Report in the UAE
Quality Assure, produce and launch two publications in 2015: UAE State of Energy Report and Dubai Green Economy Report

The Dubai Green Economy Report 2017 and UAE State of Energy Report 2017 were both quality assured by UNDP and produced. The work for phasing out the project and the preparation of a new project document, scaling up the scope and geographical coverage of publications started
Quality Assure, produce and launch two publications in 2017 (assemble in 2016): UAE State of Energy Report and Dubai Green Economy Report and close project

Both reports (Green Economy Report 2017 and State of Energy report 2017 were launched), pending payments were settled, remaining funds on this project were transferred to new output/project with the same partner.
